description:
A simple open source map viewer based on OpenStreetMap and OpenAerials, aimed to be fast and simple. 

It's quite simple for now, but a lot more features are planned like :
- Layers support (road, bicycle, foot)
- Better search
- Better UI (possibility to save favorites, remember old queries, multiple results, ...)
- Offline map support

For any question, bug report, ... please contact me directly using twitter (@moimael), mail (mael.lavault@mailz.org) or via the webosm project on github.

Please buy it if you want to support the project. It is also available on preware.

Changelog :

- Bluetooth GPS support (tested with prego), it currently require the gps device to have gps/palm/pre or pixi in its name. (can be modified in the bluetooth preferences)
- Basic route instruction
- Start and End markers added
- Route can be cleared
- Some bug fixed
- Refactored and cleaned a lot of code
versionNote: - Updated leaflet with smooth marker zoom/unzoom, better performances and a few bugfixes
